mainText:
Dear Steve:
I'm going to miss you a lot.
I'm just a teenage girl in high school right now, but trust me when I say
that you've changed my life without even knowing it. Because of you, I've
had the courage to defy my family and tell them that I'm going to make a
career out of animation, even though that's not the "practical route"
they've wanted me to take.
Through your struggles and success, I want to try so much harder to overcome
my own hardships, and I promise one day, because of your influence on me,
that I will be successful.
You were a great man.
author: Michelle
